Retrieval-Augmented Generation library with native hybrid search

Related repos

  • Go library for retrieval-augmented generation and document search
  • Collection of code examples for different Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) methods
  • Mixed Chinese and English fuzzy search engine
  • toolkit for using and training advanced retrieval models in RAG pipelines
  • fine-tunes embeddings for better retrieval in RAG pipelines
  • Full-text search for files and browser history
  • RAG-Anything—multimodal retrieval for documents with text, images, tables, and equations
  • rag app building blocks for GenAI projects
  • step-by-step notebooks for building RAG with LangChain
  • open-source RAG engine for deep document understanding
